conclusion: Analyzing forces acting on suitcase during uniform motion
Given values: mass of suitcase, minimum pull force, angle, gravitational acceleration, sin 37°, coefficient of friction, uniform motion
The image shows a suitcase which can be pushed or pulled
Identify forces: weight, normal force, pull force, friction force
Decompose pull force into horizontal and vertical components
Analyze vertical forces to find normal force expression
Analyze horizontal forces to relate friction and pull force
Substitute normal force expression into horizontal force equation
Determine minimum pull force condition using given constraint
Check if θ = 37° works for minimum force condition
Calculate coefficient of friction μ using θ = 37°
Verify if θ = 37° is indeed the minimum pull force angle
Final answer: coefficient of friction μ = 0.75, angle θ = 37°
